title: The Dive: An esports podcast
body: Releasing on Thursday every week, the gang will be diving into the biggest international news, meta shifts and solo queue trends, and in-depth analysis of the NA LCS. This week they’ll be looking at one of the biggest roster moves since Doublelift joined TSM, as he now teams up with Liquid to salvage what’s left of their Spring Split campaign. Will he be Liquid’s savior in their darkest hour? Or is this just a patch-up job for an otherwise sinking ship?

replies.body: Why is this not on Spotify yet?
They should make a youtube series!!
Finally a good and professional League of legend podcast!
I wonder if this is really the best thing for the community, there are a lot of people that do podcasts that will get hurt by this, as it will be next to impossible to expand their viewer base.

It's not like you can't listen to both... more content is always good. It forces you to improve your game. Those with good, enjoyable content will have plenty of listeners. Others will have to improve. If you want to make a living doing this, then you need to be good at it. Otherwise, it really doesn't matter.
I don't see how people can listen to multiple podcasts. I think it will be refreshing to hear more of an unedited real take from Riot Casters. They can give some pretty interesting perspective!
Making this available on Spotify would be fantastic for a lot of people. It is a huge platform, and has podcast availability as well.
I listened to the first episode and it was great! I hope you guys decide to keep it going every week! Really great listen while driving to work.
Thanks but I'll stick with "Summoner Insight"
